attributes.action: Immediately and without limit due to finance or debate increase the provision of troop carrying helicopter transport and armoured vehicles capable of giving even the most basic protection from external explosion to the UK ground forces in Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently,in the opinion of a wide proportion of the UK public, the heroic men and women of HM Armed Forces are being deployed on active service to Afghanistan without being given adequate equipment that would give them even the most basic protection in the event of attack - the Government, without reference to cost, should act immediately to supply and maintain such equipment as is deemed necessary by the Commanders on the ground in Afghanistan and not by Civil Servants based in Whitehall who live and move freely under the protection being given by the men and women of Her Majesty's Armed Forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
